casebody.data:
No. 67,

Orig.

Idaho ex rel. Evans, Governor of Idaho, et al. v. Oregon et al. [For earlier order herein, see, e. g., 442 U. S. 937.]

Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae granted, and 10 additional minutes allotted for that purpose. Plaintiffs also allotted an additional 10 minutes for oral argument.
